title: Small Talk
description: Learn Conversation Starters in the Break Room

contents.en: Hi, Tom! Are you happy with the workplace so far?
contents.id: Hai, Tom! Apakah kamu senang dengan tempat kerja sampai sejauh ini?

contents.en: Yes, it's great! Everyone is friendly. Listen, how about the team-building activities here? Are they cool?
contents.id: Ya, ini luar biasa! Semua orang ramah. Dengar, bagaimana dengan kegiatan membangun tim di sini? Apakah mereka seru?

contents.en: Yes, we go out with the team sometimes. Are you into these activities?
contents.id: Ya, kadang-kadang kami pergi bersama tim. Apakah kamu tertarik dengan kegiatan ini?

contents.en: Absolutely! They're really fun. What's the team's favorite?
contents.id: Pasti! Mereka benar-benar menyenangkan. Apa kegiatan favorit tim?

contents.en: Many of us enjoy the monthly game night. Are you into board games?
contents.id: Banyak dari kami menikmati game night bulanan. Apakah kamu suka permainan papan?

contents.en: Monopoly and Ticket To Ride are popular choices. Are you familiar with them?
contents.id: Monopoli dan Ticket To Ride adalah pilihan populer. Apakah kamu familiar dengan mereka?

contents.en: Yes, I've played both before. Great choices. Is the team into playing games on computers as well, like Gartic?
contents.id: Ya, saya pernah bermain keduanya sebelumnya. Pilihan yang bagus. Apakah tim juga suka bermain game di komputer, seperti 'Gartic'?

contents.en: Oh, yeah! Gartic is another favorite. Maybe we can play Gartic on the next game night?
contents.id: Oh, ya! Gartic adalah favorit lain. Mungkin kita bisa bermain Gartic pada game night berikutnya?

contents.en: That sounds like a plan, Sarah! Thanks for the suggestions.
contents.id: Itu terdengar seperti rencana, Sarah! Terima kasih atas saran-saran.
